customer_capabilities: refund, credit, and charge issue guidance
support_commitments: Keep context in one conversation so customers do not need to repeat details.
Move from problem to next step quickly instead of sending customers into support loops.
Use official Frontier pages, forms, and FAQ guidance when self-service or escalation is best.
Prepare handoff context for human agents when needed.

metadata.hero_title: Get help with your Frontier trip in one conversation.
metadata.hero_subtitle: Text or voice. Get clear next steps for delays, missed flights, rebooking, refunds, baggage, accessibility, and human support without starting over.
